name: html-sass-coding-dojo
description: 1. Create a new npm project by running the ff. in your terminal:    ```cmd    npm init -y    ``` 2. Create a `.gitignore` file containing the `node_modules` folder.    ```    node_modules    ``` 3. Install `sass` by running the ff.:    ```cmd    npm install --save-dev sass    ``` 4. Create a `src` folder by running the ff.:    ```cmd    mkdir src    ``` 5. Create an empty `index.scss` file in `src` folder. 6. Write an npm script for transpiling your `scss codes to css` by adding the below property in your `package.json` under `scripts`.    ```json    "sass:watch": "sass --watch src/index.scss:src/index.css"    ``` 7. Run the watch script by running the ff. in your terminal:
